gameMain.actor.Actor

Packages that use Actor
Package Description
gameMain.actor  
gameMain.world  

  • Uses of Actor in gameMain.actor

    Subclasses of Actor in gameMain.actor
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Animal
    This is the class for the main character in the game which is the frog.
    class  BackgroundImage
    Add image into the game.
    class  Digit
    Represents the number character in the game.
    class  End
    Represents the home of the frog which is the 5 platforms above.
    class  Log
    Represents the log in the game which is one of the platform for the frog to stand on it without falling into the water.
    class  Obstacle
    Represent obstacles such as the truck and lorry which had to be avoided by the frog.
    class  TimeCountdown
    Represents the timer digit in the game.
    class  Turtle
    Represents the turtle in the game which is one of the platform for the frog to stand on it without falling into the water.
    class  WetTurtle
    Represents the wet turtle in the game which the frog had to jump out of the way before getting drown.
